titleStmt.title: Some brief remarks on a paper printed and annexed to the narrative of the proceedings of the elders and messengers of the baptized churches of Christ, asserting the doctrine of personal election and final perseverance, who met in London, on May the 17. 1692. to consider of several cases, in order to preserve and encrease their mutual love, peace, concord, and welfare among themselves.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Isaac.

titleStmt.title: Some brief remarks on a paper printed and annexed to the narrative of the proceedings of the elders and messengers of the baptized churches of Christ, asserting the doctrine of personal election and final perseverance, who met in London, on May the 17. 1692. to consider of several cases, in order to preserve and encrease their mutual love, peace, concord, and welfare among themselves.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Isaac.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
